snippet: A Supreme Court ruling that recognizes a right to same-sex marriage in all 50 states would reverberate quickly through a Republican presidential field whose leading figures have not yet embraced such change and, in a few cases, have actively fought...
abstract: A Supreme Court ruling that recognizes a right to same-sex marriage in all 50 states would reverberate quickly through a Republican presidential field whose leading figures have not yet embraced such change and, in a few cases, have actively fought it.

headline.main: Same-Sex Marriage Decision to Put Spotlight on Republicans

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
